ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen limeade concentrate (such as Minute MaidÂ®), thawed
1 (12 fluid ounce) can tequila (such as CuervoÂ® Especial)
1/2 (12 fluid ounce) can brandy-based orange liqueur (such as Grand MarnierÂ®)
des: "This is the recipe that I use for all of our get-togethers that is so quick and easy and always gets rave reviews. Enjoy!"
ins: Pour the limeade concentrate into a pitcher, and fill the can with cold water. Pour into the pitcher; repeat twice more (3 cans of water). Fill the can with tequila, and pour into the pitcher; fill half the can with orange liqueur, and pour into the pitcher. Stir well, chill thoroughly, and serve over ice in salt-rimmed glasses with a lime wedge.
